    • createMP

      public Data createMP(BuildMP.Actions action, int playerPoints, int bot1Points, int bot2Points, int bot3Points) throws MessagePackageTypeNotExistsException
      Builds a MessagePackage for the view.
      Parameters:
      action - the action to be performed.
      playerPoints - the points of the player.
      bot1Points - the points of the bot1.
      bot2Points - the points of the bot2.
      bot3Points - the points of the bot3.
      Returns:
      the MessagePackage.
      Throws:
      MessagePackageTypeNotExistsException - if the action is not valid.

      Builds a MessagePackage for the view.
      Parameters:
      action - the action to be performed.
      player - the player.
      card - the card played or drawn.
      Returns:
      the MessagePackage.

    • createMP

      public Data createMP(BuildMP.Actions actions, Collection<Card> newHand, BuildMP.PG fromPg, BuildMP.PG toPg) throws MessagePackageTypeNotExistsException
      Builds a MessagePackage for the view.
      Parameters:
      actions - the actions to be performed.
      newHand - the new hand of the player.
      fromPg - who started the trade.
      toPg - who is receiving the cards.
      Returns:
      the MessagePackage.
      Throws:
      MessagePackageTypeNotExistsException - if the action is not valid.
